101.name: Switching Protocols
101.description: Switching to new protocol; obey Upgrade header

205.name: Reset Content
205.description: Clear input form for further input

300.name: Multiple Choices
300.description: Object has several resources -- see URI list

301.name: Moved Permanently
301.description: Object moved permanently -- see URI list

302.name: Found
302.description: Object moved temporarily -- see URI list

303.name: See Other
303.description: Object moved -- see Method and URL list

304.name: Not Modified
304.description: Document has not changed since given time

305.name: Use Proxy
305.description: You must use proxy specified in Location to access this resource

307.name: Temporary Redirect
307.description: Object moved temporarily -- see URI list

308.name: Permanent Redirect
308.description: Object moved permanently -- see URI list

400.name: Bad Request
400.description: Bad request syntax or unsupported method

403.name: Forbidden
403.description: Request forbidden -- authorization will not help

405.name: Method Not Allowed
405.description: Specified method is invalid for this resource

406.name: Not Acceptable
406.description: URI not available in preferred format

407.name: Proxy Authentication Required
407.description: You must authenticate with this proxy before proceeding

408.name: Request Timeout
408.description: Request timed out; try again later

410.name: Gone
410.description: URI no longer exists and has been permanently removed

417.name: Expectation Failed
417.description: Expect condition could not be satisfied

421.name: Misdirected Request
421.description: Server is not able to produce a response

422.name: Unprocessable Entity
422.description: The request was well-formed but was unable to be followed due to semantic error.

423.name: Locked
423.description: The resource that is being accessed is locked.

424.name: Failed Dependency
424.description: The request failed due to failure of a previous request

426.name: Upgrade Required
426.description: The server refuses to perform the request using the current protocol but might be willing to do so after the client upgrades to a different protocol

428.name: Precondition Required
428.description: The origin server requires the request to be conditional

429.name: Too Many Requests
429.description: The user has sent too many requests in a given amount of time ("rate limiting")

431.name: Request Header Fields Too Large
431.description: The server is unwilling to process the request because its header fields are too large

451.name: Unavailable for Legal Reasons
451.description: The user-agent requested a resource that cannot legally be provided, such as a web page censored by a government

501.name: Not Implemented
501.description: Server does not support this operation

503.name: Service Unavailable
503.description: The server cannot process the request due to a high load

504.name: Gateway Timeout
504.description: The gateway server did not receive a timely response

506.name: Variant Also Negotiates
506.description: The server has an internal configuration error: the chosen variant resource is configured to engage in transparent content negotiation itself, and is therefore not a proper end point in the negotiation process

507.name: Insufficient Storage
507.description: The method could not be performed on the resource because the server is unable to store the representation needed to successfully complete the request

508.name: Loop Detected
508.description: The server detected an infinite loop while processing the request

510.name: Not Extended
510.description: Further extensions to the request are required for the server to fulfil it

511.name: Network Authentication Required
511.description: The client needs to authenticate to gain network access
